toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
Your transaction will revert if the pric: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
Your transaction will revert if it is pe: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
Bypasses confirmation modals and allows: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
Expert mode turns off the confirm transa: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
Please type the word \"confirm\" to enab: Please type the word "confirm" to enable expert mode.
Your transaction will revert if there is: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
The difference between the market price: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.
Routing through these tokens resulted in: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.

Liquidity providers earn a 0.2% fee on a: Liquidity providers earn a 0.2% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
Connect to a wallet to view your liquidi: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
Don't see a pool you joined?: Don't see a pool you joined?
By adding liquidity you&apos;ll earn 0.2: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.2% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
Use this tool to find pairs that don't a: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
When you add liquidity, you are given po: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
Removing pool tokens converts your posit: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.

pool you can stake your liquidity tokens: pool you can stake your liquidity tokens on this page.

When you withdraw, your DAO is claimed a: When you withdraw, your DAO is claimed and your liquidity is removed from the mining pool.
When you claim without withdrawing your: When you claim without withdrawing your liquidity remains in the mining pool.
Enter an address to trigger a DAO claim. If the address has any claimable DAO it will be sent to them on submission.

1, The first liquidity mining will end o: 1, The first liquidity mining will end on November 23, 2021 at 11:00 am, after which the pool will be moved to the "Closed" page.
(1), Please withdraw your liquidity LP i: (1), Please withdraw your liquidity LP in time to participate in the second liquidity mining.
(2), The first phase of liquidity mining: (2), The first phase of liquidity mining (5k-10k DAO) and competitive mining (50k-100k DST) will be opened at the same time as the first mining session ends.
(3), The second phase of liquidity minin: (3), The second phase of liquidity mining will start on November 26, 2021 at 11am.
1, Phase 2 liquidity mining officially b: 1, Phase 2 liquidity mining officially begins at Period: November 26, 2021, 11:00 am to December 24, 2021, 11:00 am
Mining Pools&#58; USDT-DAO, USDT-ETH, US: Mining Pools: USDT-DAO, USDT-ETH, USDT-HFIL, USDT-HT, USDT-UNI, USDT-MDX, USDT-HBCH, USDT-HLTC

2, Hash mining and competitive mining op: 2, Hash mining and competitive mining open simultaneously with liquidity mining for.
Become a planetary/stellar node, invite: Become a planetary/stellar node, invite more people to participate in liquidity mining to accumulate arithmetic power, and then participate in arithmetic mining when liquidity mining ends.
Note&#58; Hash and competitive mining wi: Note: Hash and competitive mining will be counted within 3 business days after the liquidity mining ends (after 11am on November 23rd). After the end of liquidity mining, liquidity LP needs to be taken out from the reward pool in order to be used as valid arithmetic. So please prompt the invited community members to take out the liquidity LP instantly to avoid missing the arithmetic mining.
3, DAOSWAP trading paris increased to&#5: 3, DAOSWAP trading paris increased to: DAO, ETH, UNI, FIL, HT, MDEX, DOGE, SHIB, ZEC, ZKS etc. Now you can buy the above tokens directly through USDT and DAO.
Nodes are temporarily subject to USDT/DA: Nodes are temporarily subject to USDT/DAO liquidity on the HECO chain, and subsequent DAO synchronization after cross-chain.
1, Planet and Stellar node status will b: 1, Planet and Stellar node status will be determined by the number of DAO/USDT pool liquidity provider certificates (LP) held.
2, Planet nodes need >=1000 LP and Stell: 2, Planet nodes need >=1000 LP and Stellar need >=10000 LP.
3, The above criteria are valid within D: 3, The above criteria are valid within DAO price <= 30USDT, after >= 30USDT it will be decided by community vote (whether to consider lowering LP value criteria).
The 2nd period of Arithmetic and Competi: The 2nd period of Arithmetic and Competitive Mining has ended on December 10, 2021 at 11:00.

Starting from the 2nd period of Arithmet: Starting from the 2nd period of Arithmetic Mining, the Arithmetic value of the added part will be calculated at 200% according to the counted Arithmetic value, and the count of unchanged or decreased Arithmetic will remain unchanged at 100%.
3, Phase 3 liquidity mining officially s: 3, Phase 3 liquidity mining officially starts: Time: December 27, 2021, 11:00 am to January 10, 2022, 11:00 am

task8-intro: 当月邀请行星或恒星达到一定数量，额外奖励DST。
task8-1: 针对任务七已经结束，增加创世节点任务八阶梯式激励计划：
task8-4: 当月完成10个行星或者1个恒星，解锁1000DST
task8-5: 当月完成15个行星或1个恒星＋5个行星，解锁2000DST
task8-6: 当月完成20个行星或者2个恒星，解锁3000DST
task8-7: 当月完成30个行星或者3个恒星，解锁6000DST
task8-8: 当月达成50个以上行星或者5个以上恒星，解锁13900DST
task8-9: 每个月1-3号，统计上一个月，空投至节点负责人钱包地址
Directly invite planetary stellar, the i: Directly invite planetary stellar, the inviting party gets DST according to 10% of the pledged LP value.
Directly inviting single coin DAO pledge: Directly inviting single coin DAO pledges, the inviting party will receive DST according to 8% of the pledged volume.
Will be implemented on January 23rd, 202: Will be implemented on January 23rd, 2022 at 11:00 am, after this time.
Directly invite others to pledge one-yea: Directly invite others to pledge one-year USDT-DAO LPs (>= 100 LPs) , will be awarded 20% of the LP value (10% DAO, 10% DST).
Direct invitation to pledge single curre: Direct invitation to pledge single currency DAO (>=100 LPs), will be rewarded at 8% of the DAO pledge quantity in DST.
Rewards for invitations to unlock will b: Rewards for invitations to unlock will be transferred directly to the inviter's wallet address at the time of pledge by the pledging party.
tips-1: 币市有风险，入市需谨慎。加密资产交易存在较高风险，请您遵守所在国家和地区相关规定，谨慎交易。
tips-2: 警惕各类诈骗套路，授权前看清授权内容，不要把资产转给未知地址。
